name: create-vdc-with-edge-portal-api-demo
description: Demo of creating a vdc and edge using the UKCloud Portal API

scripts.generate-api: openapi-generator generate -i docs/portal-api/openapi.json -g typescript-axios -o generated/portal-api -c generated/portal-api-options.json && openapi-generator generate -i docs/vcloud-rest/openapi.json -g typescript-axios -o generated/vcloud-rest -c generated/vcloud-rest-options.json
scripts.prettier:write: prettier --write *.ts *.json .mocharc.json *.md src/**.ts *.js dist/index.html docs/*/*.json docs/*/*/*.json docs/*/*/*/*.json docs/*/*/*/*/*.json */*.json && (cd server; cargo fmt)
scripts.devrun: webpack --mode development && (cd server; cargo run 127.0.0.1:3000 portal.skyscapecloud.com)

author: Chris Couzens
